Package no.hig.hers.ludoclient

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatHandler
    Class for handling chats, clientside This handles the chat tabs, and the chat-related messages.
    ClientChatOverlayController
    Class for handling the Chat Overlays.
    ClientLoginUIController
    Handles the controls for the login GUI Where the username and passord is sent to the server And the Stage is changed too ClientMain
    ClientMainUIController
    Main controller for handling all of the main GUI features.
    ClientRegisterUIController
    Handles the controls of the register GUI Where the new username and passord is sent and the stage change back to login GUI
    CreateGameLobbyController
    Handles the createGameLobby GUI elements Where the start game button is set to disable until 1 more player has joined the lobby other than the host.
    GameClientUIController
    GameClientUICOntroller creates the LudoBoardFX class which stores all the game logic.
    GameHandler
    GameHandler creates all the different lobbyController objects and game object and controller createGameLobby, hostGameLobby and playerGameLobby gameClientUI The connection too gameserver is also set aswell as the connection loop for proccessing messages from the gameserver
    GameServer
    Each players gameserver that handles the connection between players when a Ludo game is in a session
    GameTest
    The code is from GameBoardFX.
    HostGameLobbyController
    Class that is made by the host player when the queue game option is chosen.
    LudoBoardFX
    Class that keeps track of the Ludogame.
    Main
    The main method of the client.
    Player
    Player object is created when a new connection to server is accepted.
    PlayerGameLobbyController
    Handles alle GUI for thge playerGameLobby Setting the invited player labels and the host label and removing those who leave or adding those who join th lobby
